name: Casual Illusionist
descriptionText: You can use your innate magic to create minor illusions that augment your efforts at trickery and deceit.
benefitText: As long as you have at least one spell-like ability unused from your gnome magic racial trait, you gain a +2 racial bonus on all Bluff, Disguise, and Sleight of Hand checks you make. At 10th level, these bonuses increase to +4.
specialText: This feat counts as the Deceitful feat for the purposes of all prerequisites.
